title: Update Tailwind Globs
description: Updates Tailwind v4 @source directives in styles.css to include all transitive Nx dependencies. Prefers --project if provided, otherwise auto-detects the invoking project.

project.description: (Optional) Run for a single project by name. If omitted, the generator auto-detects or processes all apps.

stylesPath.description: (Optional) Custom stylesheet path relative to the project root. Defaults to <sourceRoot>/styles.css or src/styles.css.
